subWelcome: We maintain high production standards. Quality is a priority, from raw materials, processing, to neat and attractive packaging.
testimoni: Savoury flavours that linger on the tongue, memories that come back to life with every bite.

products.title: Our Product
products.subTitle: We select only the best fish, and the end result is outstanding. Each fish goes through a rigorous selection process before being marinated. Crispy texture, just the right flavour, and a tantalising aroma.

product1.name: Dried White Anchovy
product1.description: Dried White Anchovy is a type of small anchovy known for its light color, delicate texture, and subtle umami taste. Commonly used in Southeast Asian cuisine, it is ideal for frying until crispy and served as a topping for rice, vegetables, or soups. Its crunchy bite and savory flavor make it a favorite ingredient for enhancing everyday dishes.
advantage: Extra small and crunchy, ideal for kids and elderly
Mild saltiness, easy to cook with
Popular for Indonesian sambal and stir-fried dishes

product2.name: Dried Brown Anchovy
product2.description: Dried Brown Anchovy is slightly larger and firmer than white anchovy, with a more pronounced savory flavor. It is a common choice in Indonesian home cooking, often fried or sautéed with chili and spices. Its rich taste and chewy texture make it suitable for robust dishes that need an extra layer of umami.
advantage: Meatier texture, perfect as a main dish
Crispy when fried, ideal for salty snacks
Longer shelf life when stored dry

product3.name: Salted Mackerel Fish
product3.description: Ikan Asin Kembung adalah ikan yang diawetkan secara tradisional dengan cara penggaraman untuk memperpanjang daya simpan dan memperkuat rasa. Dagingnya padat dan sedikit berminyak, sangat lezat saat digoreng atau dibakar. Sering disajikan dengan nasi, sambal, dan lalapan, ikan ini menjadi makanan rumahan yang digemari banyak keluarga Indonesia.
advantage: Rich in omega-3
Naturally savory, perfect for simple meals
Long-lasting when stored in dry conditions

product4.name: Spanish Mackerel
product4.description: Salted Spanish Mackerel is a premium salted fish known for its firm meat, minimal bones, and savory richness. This fish is ideal for frying or as a flavor base in soups and stews. Its high-quality taste and meaty texture make it a popular choice for gourmet and home-style cooking alike.

specification.title: Composition
specification.value: 100% fresh mackerel seeds, natural coarse salt

advantage: Rich in omega-3
Naturally savory, perfect for simple meals
Long-lasting when stored in dry conditions

product5.name: Hairtail Fish
product5.description: Salted Hairtail Fish, known for its long, flat body and shiny silver skin, has a mild salty taste and soft texture when cooked. It is usually cut into pieces and fried or cooked in stews with herbs and spices. This fish adds a savory depth to traditional recipes and is enjoyed for its unique appearance and flavor.
advantage: Rich in omega-3
Naturally savory, perfect for simple meals
Long-lasting when stored in dry conditions

product6.name: Black Anchovies
product6.description: Black Anchovies are smaller anchovies with a darker color and a bold, distinctive flavor. Often used in spicy dishes or sambal preparations, they bring a strong umami kick that complements rice and vegetable-based meals. Their chewy texture and rich taste make them a popular choice for those who enjoy bold flavors.

specification.title: Shape
specification.value: Slim, whole shape (with or without head depending on type)

advantage: Intense savory flavor
Excellent for bold-flavored dishes
Durable texture, doesn’t break easily

product7.name: Salted Anchovies
product7.description: Salted Anchovies (Bilis) are tiny fish with a salty, punchy flavor commonly used in Malaysian, Indonesian, and Filipino cuisines. They are typically deep-fried until golden and crispy, often served with peanuts or sambal. These anchovies are a crunchy, flavorful addition to dishes like nasi lemak or mixed rice platters.

specification.title: Shape
specification.value: Small, slender, intact (head and bones are usually still attached)

advantage: Perfect for Malay and Padang-style cuisine
Crispy and savory when fried
High in calcium and protein

about.title: #BanggaProdukLokal
about.subTitle: PT Indonesian Farming Family is a micro, small and medium enterprise (MSME) engaged in traditional Indonesian salted fish processing. We were established in 2023, with a passion to reintroduce the distinctive taste of the archipelago's sea to all corners of the country.

team.title: Our Team
team.subTitle: Let's get to know the founders at PT Indonesian Farming Family

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.subTitle: The gallery features visual documentation of the journeys, activities and works that are part of our identity.
